Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

ListUnrestEventsRequest.description: ListUnrestEventsRequest specifies filters for retrieving social unrest events.

end.description: End of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

minSeverity.description:
SeverityLevel represents a three-tier severity classification used across domains.
 Maps to existing TS unions: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'.

neLat.description: North-east corner latitude of bounding box.

neLon.description: North-east corner longitude of bounding box.

start.description: Start of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

swLat.description: South-west corner latitude of bounding box.

swLon.description: South-west corner longitude of bounding box.

ListUnrestEventsResponse.description: ListUnrestEventsResponse contains unrest events and clusters matching the request.

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

UnrestCluster.description: UnrestCluster represents a geographic cluster of related unrest events.

endAt.description: End of the cluster time window, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

eventCount.description: Number of events in this cluster.

primaryCause.description: Primary cause or theme of the unrest.

severity.description:
SeverityLevel represents a three-tier severity classification used across domains.
 Maps to existing TS unions: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'.

startAt.description: Start of the cluster time window, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

UnrestEvent.description:
UnrestEvent represents a social unrest incident (protest, riot, strike, etc.).
 Aggregated from ACLED and GDELT sources.

confidence.description:
ConfidenceLevel represents the confidence in event data accuracy.
 Used across multiple domains.

eventType.description:
UnrestEventType represents the classification of a social unrest event.
 Maps to existing TS union: 'protest' | 'riot' | 'strike' | 'demonstration' | 'civil_unrest'.

occurredAt.description: Time the event occurred, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

severity.description:
SeverityLevel represents a three-tier severity classification used across domains.
 Maps to existing TS unions: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'.

sourceType.description:
UnrestSourceType represents the data source for an unrest event.
 Maps to existing TS union: 'acled' | 'gdelt' | 'rss'.

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

get.description: ListUnrestEvents retrieves protest, riot, and civil unrest events.

parameters.description: Start of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: End of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.
parameters.name: end

parameters.description: North-east corner latitude of bounding box.
parameters.name: ne_lat

parameters.description: North-east corner longitude of bounding box.
parameters.name: ne_lon

parameters.description: South-west corner latitude of bounding box.
parameters.name: sw_lat

parameters.description: South-west corner longitude of bounding box.
parameters.name: sw_lon
